values: Damn woke up freaking early and had a really hard but great workout today. I think this year is gonna be awesome for school and football. Damn Laguna Beach was hilarous when Jason and Cedric scared the fuck out of the girls. Any guys who read this we so got to do that! Any takers?

Man it's been awhile since I've updated but I was looking at Anisa's journal and ran across some old lyrics to this really great song. So who ever reads this I really suggest if you've never heard this song download it. It'll probably get you sad or something or probably thinking about someone special. But just do it!



"Louder Than Words"

Penned this one last
because it was the hardest
Yet it meant the most to me at the same time
Feelings are tough to explain
when what i feel is bigger than any word that i can find

[chorus]
So i wrote you this song
To tell you i love you
But I know that thats much less than you deserve
It's all so much less
Then these feelings i'm feeling
I hope my actions speak louder than words
Call me whenever, and i will come running
I'm ready and waiting for ever for you
I'll give you my whole heart
To hold as your keepsake
If you should ever need proof

Remembering the times that we spent together
I know how good it feels to be in your arms
Im always so happy and filled up with laughter
when ever i'm with you i feel safe and warm

[chorus]

[x2]
Call me whenever, and i will come running
I'm ready and waiting for ever for you
I'll give you my whole heart
To hold as your keepsake
If you should ever need proof

Alots happened lately makes me wonder what will be the out come of many things. I'm just thankful that I've got someone like Brisa to talk to while I'm lost. This will be my last entry for awhile. But I'm gonna leave you with some lyrics that got me thinking about HER(#21)!


"Goodbye To You"

Of all the things I've believed in 
I just want to get it over with 
Tears form behind my eyes 
But I do not cry 
Counting the days that pass me by 

I've been searching deep down in my soul 
Words that I'm hearing are starting to get old 
It feels like I'm starting all over again 
The last three years were just pretend 
And I said, 

Goodbye to you 
Goodbye to everything I thought I knew 
You were the one I loved 
The one thing that I tried to hold on to 

I still get lost in your eyes 
And it seems that I can't live a day without you 
Closing my eyes and you chase my thoughts away 
To a place where I am blinded by the light 
But it's not right 

Goodbye to you 
Goodbye to everything I thought I knew 
You were the one I loved 
The one thing that I tried to hold on to 

And it hurts to want everything and nothing at the same time 
I want what's yours and I want what's mine 
I want you 
But I'm not giving in this time 

Goodbye to you 
Goodbye to everything I thought I knew 
You were the one I loved 
The one thing that I tried to hold on to 
The one thing that I tried to hold on to 

And when the stars fall 
I will lie awake 
You're my shooting star.

Someone really needs to make sure I take off my contacts before I go to sleep 'cause my eyes are getting restless. I REALLY MISS SOMEONE ALWALYS GETTING ON MY CASE ABOUT IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I love it when you laugh at my stupid random remarks, makes me feel like I've done something GREAT. And the way you just get that HUGE smile on my face. But most of all I love your GORGEOUS smile. WOW!

"My hopes are so high,
that your kiss might kill me.
So won't you kill me,
so I die happy.
My heart is yours to fill or burst,
to break or bury,
or wear as jewelry,
which ever you prefer."
"The sun still shines in the summertime I'll be your's if you'll be mine."

Well thanks for your so called "thoughts". But hey she was the one who called me saying things weren't so great between the two of you. And here's some advice for you, it's pretty sad how she calls me saying most of the time she's with you she's still thinking of me. Now that's just fucking low, but heck I'm just giving you a piece of my mind.

So today I just found out my mom is gonna have a baby. It's kinda of cool but then that means I'm not the BABY anymore. Oh well, at least I hope it's a boy so someone can finally lookup to me WOOOOOOOOOHOOOOOOOOO!

"What you want makes You cry, but what you need might pass you by"

I'm sure you're feeling totally confused right now because of these few words. But here's your chance to risk it all. I'm finally at your feet so please I'm begging you to "take me away". Don't give up on me yet don't let me stay here alone. "You're way to adorable to have some man make you cry.....your boyfriend doesn't know how lucky he is and I am jealous of him." You said you'd like to see that I care, well I'm gonna be the one to treat you the way you needed to be treated. I'm gonna be here with you when you need someone the most.

Hay guys this summer has been 1 crazy ride. LOL. Anyways how bout them spurs?!? I hope they take the championship. But then again we all know they're gonna. DUH!!!!

FRI- Drove Brisa @ n watch her team lose gosh wut the hell. Ey if i go, i expect them 2 win. LOL JK.

Sat- Cassie's SWEET 16. Boy wuz it fun. Jess showed up n WOW!!!! Well, u know. She had 2 take off early cuz the next day she had some golf thing. So i spend the rest of my nite dancin w/my loser best friend Brisa. BOOOOOOOOOOOOO! JK Brisa i luv ya. MUAH.

SUN- Pretty borin day. Watched the game 4 a while then headed 2 c the gang at Brisa's place. Wuzin there that long but jus wanted 2 stop by n say "WUTS UP!!!!!"

Anyways i hope every1 elses summer has been great. N if u want jus hang out giv me a call. Later.

2day wuz by far 1 of the best days i had. Every1 n i got 2gether n had this awesum water ballon fight. We swam at Lauren V's durin the day n played chingos of fun games. After that we all spilt up n head home. At Anthony's i slept 4 lik ever till the girls called n asked me 2 go swimmin at Kat's. We weren't there very long but i did happen 2 c sum1 i wuz dyin 2 c in a while. Anyway i'm pretty damn tired so i'll catch u all later.

Today i spend my morning w/Anthony, until i had 2 drop him off. This past weekend has been pretty badass w/all the partyin on Fri n Sat. Anthony, by the way blew any chance he had w/his lady friend! Poor guy (O well it happens). Met up w/Brisa this afternoon 2 watch sum film 4rm NY that she had taped. Picked up the others n headed 2 the Andy's Baseball games. Stayed 4 the 1st game n then ate at Denny's. But i'm still hungry! Played a lil Tx holdem w/Brisa n her sis. We started 2 play 4 money but Brisa got all confused tryin 2 remember how much we had 2 pay each other. Lol. Then i headed out 2 drop off every1 at their houses. Well i'm out later.

PS-  HAPPY (EARLY) BIRTHDAY TOM N MEGAN hav a great 1!

2day has gone by really fast. It started off w/every1 meetin up in the choir room to get ready n leave 4 utpa. Well there we peformed the 1st act for sum students all along edi. We head 2 Peter Piper 4 lunch n i jus hung out w/the guys playin games. Our break wuz over n We head back 2 peform the 2nd act. I wuz studden 2 hear 2 amazin girls sing there solos that were freakin awesum. I stayed over at Anthony's n sleep there. Bout 630 he woke me n wuz lik dont u hav ur concert thingy lik rite now, n i wuz lik shit cuz i had over sleep! But we did great n if u didnt happen 2 stop by n c it well ur freakin terrible! But im sure ull happen 2 catch it 2morrow, rite? LoL well im out later

Well 2day wuz lik any other day. It wuz our last practice 4 2morrows big game. Boy i really hope we win! But even if we lose will still go party out n shit so thats cool if we dont. Anyway this wkend i really hav 2 get started on that geo project. O yea n 2days Ambers Bday so Happy Bday! Well im out later.

Today went pretty damn great! It wuz lik my pretend early Bday. Well the thing is im headin out of town this weekend n ill probably come back late afternoon on Sunday. Well Jacob left yesturday n boy were Anthony n me in tears. Sum may think were lil girls but were all lik a big family. Durin 5th period it wuz the 1st time we had gone 11 on 11, which wuz pretty awesum. I feel pretty proud of myself 4 not complaining bout goin in all the huddles. Coach told me thats the way ur suppose 2 step it up when ur team needs u. Thanks. I head 2 Anthony's after sch n we watched Aladdin n Monster's Inc. Boy wuz it a tear jerker 4 the lil girl named Anthony. Took a lil nap n got ready 2 head 2 David's house so we could help him clean his room. 4rm there we head 2 Chili's n boy wuz it great! Bout 1130 we got at the bowlin alley n got our lanes. At 1st i wuz doin terrible n when Jess left out of sight i got my 1st strike n told 2 leave when she got back n she decide 2 walk away.J/K Jessica! Before we headed out she asked me wut it wuz i wanted n well the only way ur gonna no wut i asked 4 is 4rm her! So im headin out later.

Since saturdayweve been having the girls practice for their powder puff game this saturday. defensivley weve got it goin on and good offensivley but we lost osme of our key players. yesterday the whole team had a really big argument because some girls cant play so they wont get hurt for track. during the past few days ive taken my PSP and all the guys have been playing withit dude its awsome. today i went to Nikkis little sisters game at the old ehs. we were taking a walk around the school and we decided to walk inside because we found a door that was unlocked then all of a sudden we walk into the band hall and the alarm went off, so  we took off hauling ass outside so we wouldnt get caaught. i stayed for awhile but i had to take off because my parenst are leaving out of town tomorrow morning .woooo party!!!!hahaha cant wait for saturday go 007!!

hey gilbert, mmm surprise? well u saaid you were fixing your computer tom. so maybe youll see this then. well u just called and woke me up. i miss u:)
byeeeeee, ha "RED DINOSAUR"

<32112

today was like any other day, dull boring, adn tiring. oh ya todays davids birthday, happy birthday david. so i guess today wasnt as bad as i thought it was because it was good for david, hopefully. first pd we played sorry and the guys kept cheating cause they kept on sending me back to start but at least i didnt get last. third pd we played uno and boy did i forget how to play that game. thats old skool right there. fifth pd we lifted weights and found out what groups were in. im in group 5 and we have some pretty good guys and upperclassmen in our group. on my last lift of squats i told jaime i was gonna move up for him, and i ended up peeling it the first set doing only four so he was all like aye gilbert i thought you were gonna do it for me what happened! then i moved on to the 2nd,3rd,and 4th sets and i lifted two extra reps proving that i was actually going all out for jaime. coach pulled my hair even though it was super short and told me he liked the hair cut. i went to go get water after lifting weights and on the way i pinched most of the guys for not wearing green they suddenly realized iwasnt wearing green but i ran away from them and took off to the locked room and put on my green shirt. 6th pd the guys took off for the track meet and OJ called me up to see how good rio was i told himthat they were pretty good but more than likely they failed so they wouldnt be there. he said hed call me back int he afternoon to tell me how it went. so hopefully they did good. after school i went to jaimes moms house and played the incredibles new video game on xbox with jaimes nephew markie. mom got there around 530 and we headed to anthonys raspa stand and i bought a huge rocky road icecream cone. then i got home, called nikki to tell her i was trying to win her tickets for maroon five buti failed and she never answered. so i had to cut the grass, so i missed some of smallville damn. i took a break so i could see the last 20 min and my mom watched it with me for the first time and she thought tom welling was a fox she liked the show adn cried because ryan died. after it ended i called nikki and we talked and talked and talked, listened to music, but mine was better than hers. and weve talked all night. my day was boring i guess, except when i watched smallville and talked to nikki.
